entry.string: Your should receive a reply within 24 to 48 hours.
entry.translation: Yuoor shuoold receeefe-a a reply veethin 24 tu 48 huoors. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: A copy of your email has been sent to your inbox.
entry.translation: A cupy ooff yuoor imeeel hes beee sent tu yuoor inbux.

entry.string: Please enjoy the rest of your stay.
entry.translation: Pleese-a injuy zee rest ooff yuoor stey. Bork bork bork!
